patterns: What kinds of holidays are there?
How many days can we get after seach sem ?
what are the biggest holidays we can get ??
Are there any department wise special holiday ?
Can you provide information on semester breaks?
Is there a holiday calendar available?
How long is the summer vacation?
Can I take a leave for personal reasons?
Can you tell more about teachers?
who is the the principal and what about the placement officer??
How can I contact faculty members?
Are there any faculty research publications?
How can I get a list of faculty?
Do we have faculty from foreign universities?
responses:
Our Chancellor is Shri Vinai Kumar Saxena and our Vice Chancellor is Prof. Prateek Sharma. 
 Refer to this link for the faculty of CSE dept: https://www.dtu.ac.in/Web/Departments/CSE/faculty/
